Translations.Text: Ur aadilen ara wid iqqimen si lmumnin, siwa wid ivouoan, akked wid ijuhden deg ubrid n Oebbi, s wayla nnsen akked yiman nnsen. Ismenyaf Oebbi wid ijuhden s wayla nnsen akked yiman nnsen, i wid iqqimen. Akw, Iwaaaed asen Oebbi uuam. Ifrez Oebbi imjuhad af wid iqqimen, s warraz ameqwoaean
aseqoeb $uoeS, ssmae, akked ueunu. Oebbi Izga Ipsemmie, Ipeunu

Ih, i wid iwumi ddment lmalayek leowae, u densen iman nnsen, ad inint: "anida tellam"? A d inin: "nella d uohifen di tmurt". Ad inint: "day ur tewsia ara tmurt n Oebbi, a ppinigem degs"? Widak, axxam nnsen d Loahennama. A tu$alin tucmip
Kkes ed uohifen, argaz, tameiiut, agrud, ur nezmir i tsensert, ur nepwanhu s abrid
Widak, amar Oebbi ad asen Isemmee. Oebbi Izga Ipqili, Ipsemmie

Win iunagen deg ubrid n Oebbi, ad iaf, di tmurt, aias n ssoanat akked lufa. Win iff$en seg uxxam is, d iminig ar Oebbi akked Umazan iS, sinna, temmuger it tmeppant, arraz is atan ar Oebbi. Oebbi Izga Ipsemmie, Ipeunu
Mi teppeddum di tmurt, ulac u$ilif ma teeeemeim taeallit, ma tugadem a d eeedmen fellawen wid ijehlen. Ih, ijehliyen banen d icenga nnwen
